params._timeToStartMachine: time to build the machine for the first time

params._initialHash: hash before divergence, in which both client and provider agree.
params._provider: address that will provide memory values/proofs.

params.proof: The proof that the old value was correct

finishProofPhase(uint256).notice: Stop memory insertion and start read and write phase

proveRead(uint256,uint64,bytes8,bytes32[.notice: Proves that a certain value in current memory is correct

proveWrite(uint256,uint64,bytes8,bytes8,.notice: Register a write operation and update newHash
